thread.title: Brooklyn Man Charged in Imam’s Fatal Shooting Is Set For Trial

author: Corinne Ramey
title: Brooklyn Man Charged in Imam’s Fatal Shooting Is Set For Trial
text:
The man accused of fatally shooting a Queens imam and his assistant in broad daylight in 2016 is expected to go on trial as soon as Tuesday.
Prosecutors say Oscar Morel, 37 years old, of Brooklyn, gunned down Imam Maulana Alauddin Akonjee and his friend, Thara Uddin, as they walked home from Saturday afternoon prayers at Al-Furqan Jame Masjid, a mosque in the Ozone Park section of Queens. Both men were shot in the head and pronounced dead at a hospital.
